Package org.cesecore.certificates.util.cert

Class QCStatementExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.util.CertTools
      • org.cesecore.certificates.util.cert.QCStatementExtension
  • public final class QCStatementExtension
extends CertTools
    A class for reading values from QC-statement extension.
    Version:
    $Id: QCStatementExtension.java 23659 2016-06-10 15:16:35Z anatom $

    • Method Detail

      • hasQcStatement

        public static boolean hasQcStatement​(Certificate cert)
        Returns true if the certificate contains a QC-statements extension.
        Parameters:
        cert - Certificate containing the extension
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • getQcStatementIds

        public static Collection<String> getQcStatementIds​(Certificate cert)
                                            throws IOException
        Returns all the 'statementId' defined in the QCStatement extension (rfc3739).
        Parameters:
        cert - Certificate containing the extension
        Returns:
        Collection of String with the oid, for example "1.1.1.2", or empty Collection if no identifier is found, never returns null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the certificate

      • getQcStatementValueLimit

        public static String getQcStatementValueLimit​(Certificate cert)
                                       throws IOException
        Returns the value limit ETSI QCStatement if present.
        Parameters:
        cert - Certificate possibly containing the QCStatement extension
        Returns:
        String with the value and currency (ex '50000 SEK')or null if the extension is not present
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the certificate

      • getQcStatementAuthorities

        public static String getQcStatementAuthorities​(Certificate cert)
                                        throws IOException
        Returns the 'NameRegistrationAuthorities' defined in the QCStatement extension (rfc3739).
        Parameters:
        cert - Certificate containing the extension
        Returns:
        String with for example 'rfc822Name=foo2bar.se, rfc822Name=bar2foo.se' etc. Supports email, dns and uri name, or null of no RAs are found.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the certificate

      • getStatementStringValue

        public static String getStatementStringValue​(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Sequence seq,
                                             String statementoid,
                                             int pos)
                                      throws IOException
        Assumes that the statementoid in the QcStatements Sequence, seq, is a String and extracts that value from position, pos, of sequence
        Parameters:
        seq - ASN.1 sequence
        statementoid - OIS
        pos - position
        Returns:
        value
        Throws:
        IOException - on error
